remarks: 1-1 onto function in maps-to notation which shifts a finite set of sequential integers.  Formerly part of proof for ~ fsumshft . (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2019.)
statement:
mptfzshft.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
mptfzshft.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
mptfzshft.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
mptfzshft $p |- ( ph -> ( j e. ( ( M + K ) ... ( N + K ) ) |-> ( j - K ) ) : ( ( M + K ) ... ( N + K ) ) -1-1-onto-> ( M ... N ) ) $.
$d K j $.
$d M j $.
$d N j $.
$d j ph $.
